object.course_desc: For students with no knowledge of German. Oral skills, reading and writing. Compulsory attendance.
object.course_extra_details:
Includes: Experiential Learning Activity
Precludes additional credit for GERM1110.
Four hours a week.

object.course_desc: Continuation of first-year German. Oral skills, reading and writing. Compulsory attendance.
object.course_extra_details:
Includes: Experiential Learning Activity
Precludes additional credit for GERM1110.
Prerequisite(s): grade of C or higher in GERM1010, or permission of the School.
Four hours a week.
object.course_prerequisites: grade of C or higher in GERM1010, or permission of the School.

object.course_desc: For students with no knowledge of German. Oral skills, reading and writing. Compulsory attendance.
object.course_extra_details:
Includes: Experiential Learning Activity
Precludes additional credit for GERM1010 and GERM1020.
Eight hours a week (one term).

object.course_desc: For students with no prior knowledge of German who would like to develop the skills to read a variety of German texts, including passages from scholarly journals, reports, online newspaper or magazine articles.
object.course_extra_details:
Includes: Experiential Learning Activity
Three hours a week.

object.course_desc: Further study of German to reach a more advanced level of ability in a range of situations. Equal emphasis on oral and written language. Compulsory attendance.
object.course_extra_details:
Includes: Experiential Learning Activity
Precludes additional credit for GERM2110.
Prerequisite(s): grade of C or higher in GERM1020, GERM1110, or permission of the School.
Four hours a week.
object.course_prerequisites: grade of C or higher in GERM1020, GERM1110, or permission of the School.

object.course_desc: Continuation of second-year German. Further study of German to reach a more advanced level of ability in a range of situations. Equal emphasis on oral and written language. Compulsory attendance.
object.course_extra_details:
Includes: Experiential Learning Activity
Precludes additional credit for GERM2110.
Prerequisite(s): grade of C or higher in GERM2010, or permission of the School.
Four hours a week.
object.course_prerequisites: grade of C or higher in GERM2010, or permission of the School.

object.course_desc: Further study of German to reach a more advanced level of ability in a range of situations. Equal emphasis on oral and written language. Compulsory attendance.

Includes: Experiential Learning Activity
Precludes additional credit for GERM2010 and GERM2020.

Eight hours a week (one term).

object.course_desc: A continuation of Reading in German I. Further development of reading skills in German.
object.course_extra_details:
Includes: Experiential Learning Activity
Prerequisite(s): grade of C or higher in GERM2000 or permission of the School.
Three hours a week.
object.course_prerequisites: grade of C or higher in GERM2000 or permission of the School.

object.course_desc: Continuation of the study of German to reach a more advanced level, including the ability to handle authentic materials and primary texts required for academic studies. Compulsory attendance.
object.course_extra_details:
Includes: Experiential Learning Activity
Prerequisite(s): grade of C or higher in GERM2020, GERM2110, or permission of the School.
Six hours a week (one term).
object.course_prerequisites: grade of C or higher in GERM2020, GERM2110, or permission of the School.

object.course_desc: Advanced spoken and written German with intensive practice in aural comprehension and speaking in a range of situations and contexts, in reading and in composition in a range of modes and genres. Metalinguistic study. Compulsory attendance.
object.course_extra_details:
Includes: Experiential Learning Activity
Prerequisite(s): grade of C or higher in GERM3110, or permission of the School.
Six hours a week (one term).
object.course_prerequisites: grade of C or higher in GERM3110, or permission of the School.

object.course_desc: Development of language use for specific purposes in contexts such as the academic, business and technical domains.
object.course_extra_details:
Includes: Experiential Learning Activity
Prerequisite(s): grade of C or higher in GERM4110, or permission of the School.
Three hours per week.
object.course_prerequisites: grade of C or higher in GERM4110, or permission of the School.

object.course_desc: Selected topics in German-speaking cultures and societies. Development of advanced language skills.
object.course_extra_details:
Includes: Experiential Learning Activity
Prerequisite(s): grade of C or higher in GERM4110, or permission of the School.
Three hours per week.
object.course_prerequisites: grade of C or higher in GERM4110, or permission of the School.

object.course_desc: Research in a topic in German language, literature or linguistics under the supervision of a member of the School.
object.course_extra_details:
Includes: Experiential Learning Activity
Prerequisite(s): third- or fourth-year standing in the Minor in German, grade of C or higher in GERM4110 or equivalent, or permission of the School.
object.course_prerequisites: third- or fourth-year standing in the Minor in German, grade of C or higher in GERM4110 or equivalent, or permission of the School.
